attributes.action: Force Priti Patel to stop illegal and economic migrants crossing the channel
attributes.additional_details: Because it was part of their manifesto for election and partly for brexit. Telling the voters they would put a stop to it when in fact the numbers are higher than ever
attributes.background: Stop the amount of illegals entering UK everyday via the English channel. More have entered since we left the EU. Why are we collecting these people and bringing them to our shores they need returning to France a perfectly safe country.  No passport no entry

rejection.details:
Illegal immigration is already illegal. We're not sure what action you'd like the Government to take. 

We're also not sure who you'd like to be covered by a ban on economic migrants.
